title: Add prominent Take Quiz button on landing page

requirements.text: Add an additional large, prominent "Take Quiz" button in the main content area of the landing page (not only in the header corner) that navigates to the quiz view via the existing onNavigateToQuiz handler.

quotes: please add one more big button for the quiz on the main page since the "take quiz" option is very small and only in the corner

acceptanceCriteria: On the landing page (PhysioTrackLanding), there is a clearly visible large "Take Quiz" button within the hero section or other main body content area (not just in the top-right header button group).
Clicking the new large "Take Quiz" button navigates to the quiz view using the existing navigation flow (App view switches to 'quiz').
The existing small header "Take Quiz" button remains functional.
The new large button uses existing UI components (shadcn Button) and is visually comparable in prominence to other primary CTAs (e.g., size="lg").
Layout remains responsive: the button is easily tappable and does not overlap other content on small screens.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
nonGoals: Do not add new quiz questions, scoring logic, or change quiz behavior.
Do not add new routes or URL-based navigation; continue using the existing local state view switching in App.tsx.
